title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.25 - Berth usage; raising of vessels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.25 - Berth usage; raising of vessels

State Regulations

In the event that a watercraft shall sink or submerge at
a terminal, the owner, agent or permittee shall, at his own expense, cause such
watercraft to be raised and immediately removed from the
terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
